analysis.description:
IERC20Token.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#28) shadows:
	- IERC20Token.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#26-28)

Hedge.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#92) shadows:
	- Hedge.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#89-93)
	- IERC20Token.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#26-28)

Hedge.transfer (/unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#104-117) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(! (msg.sender == owner && block.timestamp < timeLock && (balances[msg.sender] - _value) < 10000000 * 10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#108-111)

Hedge.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#134-148) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(! (_from == owner && block.timestamp < timeLock && (balances[_from] - _value) < 10000000 * 10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xffe8196bc259e8dedc544d935786aa4709ec3e64.sol#140-141)
